description.en: Search for target value in sorted array.
description.zh-CN: [题目704] Search for target value in sorted array....
description.zh-TW: [題目704] Search for target value in sorted array....
description.ja: [問題704] Search for target value in sorted array....
description.es: [Problema 704] Search for target value in sorted array....
description.de: [Problem 704] Search for target value in sorted array....
description.fr: [Problème 704] Search for target value in sorted array....

explanation.en: APL solution for Binary Search. Uses where (⍸) to find indices of true/non-zero elements. Uses enclose (⊂) to wrap elements or disclose (⊃) to unwrap/extract. Implementation uses APL's array-oriented primitives for concise expression.
explanation.zh-CN: Binary Search 的 APL 解决方案。使用 where (⍸) 查找真值/非零元素的索引。使用封闭 (⊂) 包装元素或展开 (⊃) 解包/提取。实现使用 APL 的面向数组原语进行简洁表达。
explanation.zh-TW: Binary Search 的 APL 解決方案。使用 where (⍸) 查找真值/非零元素的索引。使用封閉 (⊂) 包裝元素或展開 (⊃) 解包/提取。實現使用 APL 的面向陣列原語進行簡潔表達。
explanation.ja: APL solution for Binary Search. Uses where (⍸) to find indices of true/non-zero elements. Uses enclose (⊂) to wrap elements or disclose (⊃) to unwrap/extract. Implementation uses APL's array-oriented primitives for concise expression.
